        name - - Name of the instance
        privateIP - - Private IP address of the instance
        publicDNSName - - Public DNS name of the instance
        hbSendPortNum - - Port number to send UDP heartbeat
        hbReceivePortNum - - Port number to receive UDP heartbeat
        serverStatus - - Status of server
